title: Synergistic impacts of nanopollutants (nZnO) and hypoxia on bioenergetics and metabolic homeostasis in a marine bivalve Mytilus edulis
content:

Coastal ecosystems face increasing threats from anthropogenic pollution and environmental stressors like hypoxia and nanoparticle exposure. The Baltic Sea exemplifies these challenges due to nutrient pollution and hypoxia. We investigated...
